Name: Revenant
About the game: Revenant is a 2D pixel-art style shooting game set in the near future. Enjoy the fun of the main character Beta sweeping away his enemies to get freedom! Different than typical 2D shooting games, We have a unique system called 'Precise aim' The hit detection only occurs when the cursor is aiming enemy's hitbox. With this unique system, you can enjoy our energetic battle! Thanks! This is chungkang college of cultural industries graduation project. Sorry for many bugs :( Contact us Team Leader - Hwanjin You meiroo2@naver.com
